data.message: The notification page and feed are not working. I can see only the last 5 or 6 notices and then the page is stuck on the spinning upload symbol. It's been like that for 2 or 3 days now and it's getting worse with each day with less and less notices being visible.  😕

replies.message: Hey Laurin. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2yhJVMK. -Kiara
Facebook Thank you for trying to help me. I appreciate it so much.
